data.name: Master of Pieces Â© Jigsaw Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
Free high-quality Jigsaws with lot of features


  • - Multiple puzzle pieces selection!
  • Different Cutouts shapes
  • Rotation and Sorting features
  • Useful Zoom to control the whole puzzle surface
  • Magnifier tool
  • Customizable background color
  • Wide cutout range
  • Light UI and Hotkeys feature for easy gameplay
  • Incredible HD pictures, no blurry pieces
  • Relaxing soundtrack
  • Permanent updates of Free Images
  • Holiday Free Events!

We decided to get the opinion of players, and develop high-quality jigsaw puzzles for PC\Mac, which will be similar to real puzzles. We've already added a few handy tools to the game, like the Magnifying Glass or Moving the Table, and we've made sure that the picture is not blurry when zooming, but stays as clear as possible.
We'd love to hear what you think of the game, get feedback and maybe some good advice.

Jigsaw puzzle fans, join in!

data.short_description: Free heartwarming Jigsaw Puzzles. Enjoy relaxing atmosphere with this incredible HD Jigsaws. Become the Master of Pieces!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
